Title: Spar Day
Description:
Your skills in combat are impressive, $n. 

We are rotating our next round of reserves into active duty, and they need to sharpen their skills. 

While Alleria fills me in on Xal'atath, I would appreciate it if you could help with their training.
CompletionText: The tricks they learn from you today will help them survive a difficult encounter later.
RewardText:
Thank you.

What they learnt from you will no doubt save their lives later.
